description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Wuxi, China. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: China Wuxi Lakeside Hotel with Indoor Pool, Spa & Two Restaurants
hotels.description: Set within Wuxi's vibrant Xinwu District, this contemporary retreat places you moments from the tranquil Taihu Lake and the lush greenery of Liyuan gardens. Explore the architectural marvels of Nanchan Temple or stroll the picturesque Grand Canal, both just a short drive away from your elegant urban retreat. Return to refined interiors where you can savour Jiangnan cuisine at the sophisticated La Cuisine or sample Cantonese delicacies at Le Chinois Chinese Restaurant. When it's time to relax, the hotel features a shimmering heated indoor pool and a state-of-the-art spa offering indulgent treatments.

seo.title: Hoteles en Wuxi - China Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Wuxi, China con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
